Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Logo Maker application

Features:
- Landing page with 4 feature cards
- Text Logo Creator with fonts, colors, effects
- Icon + Text Combo builder with 50+ icons
- Template Gallery with 15 pre-made templates
- AI-Powered Generator using Gemini API
- PNG/SVG download support

Stack: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
